message: Let's start with a fair deal, but be prepared to negotiate. I'm not afraid to take a bigger share if needed.
You started with a strong offer, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. Will you accept a smaller share?
I'm willing to compromise, but your offer was too low. This is my final offer before the inflation hurts us both.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I won't go below 600k
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I'm not going lower than this. We need to reach an agreement soon before the inflation eats away at our profits.
I'm not budging much, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't think you can get more than this!
